item.title: Install OpenStack AIO via Kolla-ansible
item.description: Introduction This article is my note during installing OpenStack AIO via Kolla-ansible. Topology We will use two nodes. One is for OpenStack, one is for Kolla-ansible which will be used to install OpenStack to the OpenStack node. Installing Step 1: Prepare environment Networking: You need to setup two nodes with two interfaces as the above topology. Kolla-ansible node with connect to OpenStack node via management network. OpenStack node will be configured to get public network as provider network in OpenStack system.
